name: PICT_Cubicles
description:
How To Play

Rotating Cube is moving forward linearly. You have to create a path for it by displacing pillars upward or downward by either holding, sliding or tapping the pillars which results in widening the path. 

As you move further speed of cube will get increase gradually.

  • Game Credits: 
  • Programmer :      Apurv Henkare 
  • Designers:            Prajwal Pawar, Chinmay Surve

All the best !
